```{r}
data = read_csv("./data/dataset.final.csv") %>% 
  select(-X1, -county_name, -state_abbr)

set.seed(3)
trRows <- createDataPartition(data$ale,
                              p = .75,
                              list = F)


data[2,34] = NA
x <- model.matrix(ale~., data)[,-1]
x = x[match(rownames(data), rownames(x)),]

n = dim(data)[2]
for (i in 2 : n){
  x[,names(data)[i]] = data[[i]]
}
rownames(x) = rownames(data)

y <- data$ale


#Train data
x1<-as.matrix(x)[trRows,]
y1<-data$ale[trRows]
data_train = data[trRows,]

#Test data
x2<-as.matrix(x)[-trRows,]
y2<-data$ale[-trRows]
data_test = data[-trRows,]
```

## Regression Tree

```{r}
ctrl <- trainControl(method = "cv")

set.seed(1)
# tune over cp, method = "rpart"
rpart.fit <- train(x1, y1, 
                   method = "rpart",
                   tuneGrid = data.frame(cp = exp(seq(-6,-4, length = 20))),
                   preProcess = c( "center", "scale", "knnImpute"),
                   trControl = ctrl)
ggplot(rpart.fit, highlight = TRUE)
rpart.plot(rpart.fit$finalModel)
```

## Bagging

```{r}
bag.grid <- expand.grid(mtry = 33,
                       splitrule = "variance",
                       min.node.size = 1:15)
set.seed(1)
bag.fit <- train(x1, y1, 
                method = "ranger",
                tuneGrid = bag.grid,
                preProcess = c( "center", "scale", "knnImpute"),
                trControl = ctrl)

ggplot(bag.fit, highlight = TRUE)

bag.fit$bestTune
```

## Random Forest

```{r}
rf.grid <- expand.grid(mtry = 1:33,
                       splitrule = "variance",
                       min.node.size = 1:15)
set.seed(1)
rf.fit <- train(x1, y1, 
                method = "ranger",
                tuneGrid = rf.grid,
                preProcess = c( "center", "scale", "knnImpute"),
                trControl = ctrl)

ggplot(rf.fit, highlight = TRUE)

rf.fit$bestTune
```
